Name: osteosclerotic myeloma
Definition: A myeloid neoplasm that is located in the plasma cells in bone marrow.

Name: obsolete plasma cell myeloma PTLD
Definition: A myeloid neoplasm that is located in the plasma cells in bone marrow.

Name: refractory plasma cell neoplasm
Definition: A myeloid neoplasm that is located in the plasma cells in bone marrow.

Name: obsolete recurrent plasma cell neoplasm
Definition: A myeloid neoplasm that is located in the plasma cells in bone marrow.

Name: non-secretory myeloma
Definition: A myeloid neoplasm that is located in the plasma cells in bone marrow.

Name: indolent myeloma
Definition: A myeloid neoplasm that is located in the plasma cells in bone marrow.

Name: smoldering myeloma
Definition: A multiple myeloma that is a slow growing type of myeloma in which abnormal plasma cells results_in too much of a single type of monoclonal antibody.

Name: obsolete adrenal gland hypofunction
Definition: A multiple myeloma that is a slow growing type of myeloma in which abnormal plasma cells results_in too much of a single type of monoclonal antibody.
